body.name: Sanus Adjustable Height Speaker Stand - Extends 28" to 38" - Holds Satellite & Small Bookshelf Speakers (i.e. Bose, Harmon Kardon, Polk, JBL, KEF, Klipsch, Sony and Others) - Set of 2 - Model: HTBS
features: Built from heavy-gauge steel for superior performance and a wide stable base to deliver a high-quality audio experience, the SANUS height-adjustable pair of speaker stands are the ideal addition to your home theater setup.

To ensure a perfectly customizable sound, the extendable tube is adjustable from 28" to 38". The easy-to-use collar makes height changes a breeze without the need for additional tools. For a clean look, the SANUS HTBS surround sound speaker stand features a concealed wire path, this built-in cable management channel helps keep your speaker wire out of the way.

Truly universal, this pair of speaker stand is engineered to hold small satellite and bookshelf speakers up to 3.5lbs. Compatible with Bose, Harmon Kardon, JBL, Sony, Samsung speakers, and more. The set features three mounting configurations including L-shaped brackets, top plate, and keyhole adapter to maximize compatibility with your speakers.
The installation is as easy as 1,2,3, these rear speaker stands are shipped with all the required hardware including base pads & screws.

Experience the Sanus difference. The SANUS adjustable height speaker stand comes with a 5-year warranty, and top-notch Minnesota based customer service. Our experts are ready to chat 7 days a week if you have questions or run into a snag.
body.description: SANUS SPEAKER STANDS - Pair (HTBS) Top Quality Speaker Stands at a Great Value With the HTBS Sanus Speaker stand, we crafted a pair of speaker stands that are rich in style, highly functionable and durable. Designed specifically for smaller speakers & bookshelves, the HTBS can effortlessly support satellite and surround speakers up to 3.5 lbs. The value speaks for itself, the Sanus HTBS is the most reviewed pair of adjustable speaker stand on Amazon. Functionality Meets Style Height adjustable from 28" to 38", you can customize the position of your floor stand right at ear level for optimal performance. The heavy cast iron bases provide excellent stability for your small bookhelf or regular speakers. Furthermore, due to the monochromatic colors & the pure simple lines, these stands are esthaetically pleasing and balanced so they look great in any room. Universally Compatible The Sanus HTBS Speaker Stands universal design makes them compatible with a wide range of speaker brands such as Bose speakers, Vizio speakers, Harmon speakers, Kardon speakers, Polk speakers, JBL speakers,Samsung speakers, Sony speakers and more...They also have 3 different mounting methods: top plates, L-shaped brackets, and keyhole slot adapters fitting back-bolt & even bottom-bolt types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great for Vizio Elevate Rear Speakers or Speakers With Protruding Connectors
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for rear speaker stands that would accommodate the protruding speaker connections for the rear speakers on a Vizio Elevate. Most stands do not have a gap to clear them and after searching for awhile , I found that this brand worked well with them and they do. I cant utilize the holes in the tubes to hide the speaker wire due to the molded connectors on the speakers but the included velcro straps worked great to run the wire down the stand and you don't notice it all and it still looks good. The stands themselves are easily put together and height adjustable. They are solid and the base heavy enough to keep upright and stay in position and look good in my opinion. If you have speakers that have a molded connection poking out of the rear , these stands will accommodate for that so your speakers still sit straight. For speakers with just the wires going in , you will be able to fish them through the tubes If need be. I'm happy with these and would recommend these stands for any rear speakers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used them for a pair of Bose satellite speakers and they worked perfectly. Well made and easy to assemble. Able to hide speaker wire through the stand itself and the sticky pads so far are holding the speakers on nicely (as Bose has slots made for their stands) so no screws holding them on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good product the adjustments are a little loose
reviews.reviewText: These are easy to put together. The pad for the base were hard to get off the paper. The adaptors for the slot were hard to put in and one will not fully tighten. The speakers are stable and the stands work.Make sure you put the speaker wire in the stand tubes before assembly.It would be nice if there was a way to hide the electrical cord in the stand tubes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use for rear speakers I bought from Best Buy. They fit and work perfectly. They are stable and have the ability to hide/stow speaker wiring if needed. Good price and good quality. Buyers just to need to validate the height of these stands will meet their needs. Good value for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Speakers are now where they belong
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea of having a sandbar and rear speakers, and I’ve been dying to put the rear speakers on stands. These stands are awesome! They’re easy to put together, fit almost any kind of speaker, and they have weighted bases. Their height is adjustable, and I love them! They really enhance my viewing pleasure as silly as that sounds…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and functional
reviews.reviewText: There's not much else to say other than, they look good, tuck away well, and safely hold our speakers. Nothing to complain about here. Price is extremely reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy. Well built, versatile.
reviews.reviewText: They are easy to assemble to the speakers you want to attach. They will accommodate 3 different types of small satellites or bookshelf mounting systems. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good idea. Bad execution
reviews.reviewText: I love the look. Unfortunately my surround speakers have “plugs” that go into the back of the speakers as well as the sub. So hiding them inside is not possible. By the time I got them together (not the easiest) I didn’t feel like boxing them back up so I used black electrical tape to “hide” the cords. They are definitely sturdy and heavy bases. They fit well in the back of my room and my Vizio speakers just screwed right into the adapter very easily. They have to be sideways but that’s fine with me. The material feels like it’ll last a lifetime. Worth the money if you have a receiver with just wires to connect your speakers. If you have plugs off any kind do not buy this. The hole is large at the base the super duper small at the top. Whoever designed this wasn’t thinking clearly. Or this is only for what I just described and should be advertised that way and not for speakers with plugs of any kind.

Me funcionó perfecto para las bocinas de mi barra samsung. Tiene buena estabilidad y tiene varias formas de conexión dependiendo el tipo de bocina. Me gustó y lo principal cumple con su función. Son delgadas y tienen buen diseño, quizá las bases se siente un poco asperas, pero por el material tiene que ser pesado para que tenga buen agarre

Product specifications said maximum weight is 1.6Kg. But since I saw on reviews people using this for Q990C and this is significantly cheap than other alternatives I bought this. It feels steady and safe with the weight of rear speakers. You need 1/4” imperial bolt to fix the speaker to stand
Pour le prix, bon produit.Stable, beaucoup d'options de fixation, passe câbles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to mount rear speakers for a Samsung HW-990 sound bar. These fit perfectly and feel secure. The cables don’t run through the legs, they run on the outside. Velcro ties are provided and these work well. Some buyers have experienced issues with the plastic tightening nut, but mine worked fine. Overall these look sleek, are solid and are easy to assemble . I would definitely recommend these Sanus speaker stands.
